summary: Comprehensive testing of CompassX CRM owner selection, AI Copilot, Reports, and Pipeline features completed successfully. All 16 backend tests passed. Frontend testing verified owner dropdowns in Organization/Contact/Opportunity forms, AI Copilot functionality (summarize and suggest_activity), Reports page analytics, and My Pipeline vs Main Pipeline filtering.
passed_tests: Backend: Login authentication with brian.clements@compassx.com
Backend: Get all users for owner dropdown API
Backend: Create organization with specific owner_id
Backend: Create contact with specific owner_id
Backend: Create opportunity with specific owner_id - CRITICAL FIX VERIFIED
Backend: AI Copilot - summarize action returns meaningful summary
Backend: AI Copilot - suggest_activity action returns activity suggestion
Backend: AI Copilot - invalid action rejected with 400
Backend: Analytics summary endpoint returns all expected fields
Backend: Analytics by-owner endpoint returns owner performance data
Backend: Pipeline analytics endpoint returns stage data
Backend: Engagement types analytics endpoint
Backend: Main pipeline (dashboard/sales) shows ALL opportunities with users array
Backend: My pipeline (dashboard/my-pipeline) filters by current user's owner_id
Backend: Pipeline filtering comparison - my_count <= main_count
Frontend: Login form and successful login
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Create Opportunity dialog (Pipeline page)
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Add Organization dialog (Organizations page)
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Add Contact dialog (Contacts page)
Frontend: Reports page loads with 4 metric cards (Total Pipeline, Weighted Forecast, Win Rate, At Risk)
Frontend: Owner performance table displayed on Reports page
Frontend: AI Sales Copilot - Summarize button works and displays response
Frontend: AI Sales Copilot - Suggest Activity button works and displays response
Frontend: My Pipeline shows 'Brian's Engagements' badge
Frontend: My Pipeline filters to show only user-owned opportunities
Frontend: Main Pipeline shows opportunities with owner names (Brian Clements)
seed_data_creation: Tests created test data with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: All owner selection features (Organization, Contact, Opportunity) work correctly - owner_id is properly saved based on dropdown selection. AI Copilot uses real Emergent LLM Key (GPT-5.2) and produces quality responses. My Pipeline correctly filters to show only current user's opportunities while main Pipeline shows all opportunities with owner names displayed.

verified_features.owner_selection_organization: Working - dropdown shows all users, owner_id saved correctly
verified_features.owner_selection_contact: Working - dropdown shows all users, owner_id saved correctly
verified_features.owner_selection_opportunity: Working - dropdown shows all users, owner_id saved correctly (FIX VERIFIED)
verified_features.ai_copilot_suggest_activity: Working - returns specific actionable next steps
verified_features.reports_analytics_by_owner: Working - displays owner performance table with pipeline value, deals, win rate
verified_features.reports_summary_metrics: Working - displays Total Pipeline, Weighted Forecast, Win Rate, At Risk
verified_features.my_pipeline_filter: Working - filters by logged-in user's owner_id
verified_features.main_pipeline_all: Working - shows all opportunities with owner names
